body_html:
From my point of view we should ditch other_interests @mkalininait, since as you say, it's not obvious which piece of information not covered by the other fields is supposed to go there.

In my opinion the other fields already cover everything necessary ✌️

body:
From my point of view we should ditch `other_interests` @mkalininait, since as you say, it's not obvious which piece of information not covered by the other fields is supposed to go there.

In my opinion the other fields already cover everything necessary ✌️
